chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
oiai: output_implies_applied_interface
aiii: applied_implies_input_interface
si: sorted_interface
lacimi: lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface
smsi: state_machine_safety_interface
misi: max_index_sanity_interface
uii: unique_indices_interface
client: clientId
id: nat

Goal:
forall (net : network) (p : packet) (es : list entry) (e : entry), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In p (nwPackets net) -> mEntries (pBody p) = Some es -> In e es -> 0 < eIndex e

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : Net.name; pDst : Net.name; pBody : Net.msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
Record sorted_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_sorted_interface { handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.msg Arguments pBody {P params}
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Inductive raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RIR_init : raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input)
Record lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface { lastApplied_commitIndex_match_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> lastApplied_commitIndex_match net; commitIndex_lastApplied_match_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> commitIndex_lastApplied_match net; lastApplied_lastApplied_match_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> lastApplied_lastApplied_match net } Arguments lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_lastApplied_commitIndex
Record state_machine_safety_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_state_machine_safety_interface { state_machine_safety_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> state_machine_safety net } Arguments state_machine_safety_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_state_machine_safety_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record output_implies_applied_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_output_implies_applied_interface { output_implies_applied : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> key_in_output_trace client id tr -> in_applied_entries client id net } Arguments output_implies_applied_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_output_implies_applied_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params
clientId = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (RaftParams0 : RaftParams orig_base_params) => let (_, _, _, clientId, _) := RaftParams0 in clientId : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments clientId {orig_base_params RaftParams}
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Record max_index_sanity_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_max_index_sanity_interface { max_index_sanity_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> maxIndex_sanity net } Arguments max_index_sanity_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_max_index_sanity_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
nwPackets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (nwPackets, _) := n in nwPackets : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> list packet Arguments nwPackets {P params}
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
eIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (_, _, _, eIndex, _, _) := e in eIndex : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> logIndex Arguments eIndex {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record log_matching_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_log_matching_interface { log_matching_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> log_matching net } Arguments log_matching_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_log_matching_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
mEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (p : msg) => match p with | AppendEntries _ _ _ _ entries _ => Some entries | _ => None end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), msg -> option (list entry) Arguments mEntries {orig_base_params raft_params}
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Record unique_indices_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_unique_indices_interface { UniqueIndices_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> UniqueIndices net } Arguments unique_indices_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_unique_indices_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record applied_implies_input_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_applied_implies_input_interface { applied_implies_input : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))) (e : entry), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> eClient e = client -> eId e = id -> applied_implies_input_state client id (eInput e) net -> in_input_trace client id (eInput e) tr } Arguments applied_implies_input_interface {
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
entries_max_thing : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (es : list entry), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In p (nwPackets net) -> mEntries (pBody p) = Some es -> es <> [] -> 1 <= maxIndex es
applied_implies_input_state = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (i : input) (net : network) => exists e : entry, correct_entry client id i e /\ ((exists h : Net.name, In e (log (nwState net h))) \/ (exists (p : packet) (entries : list entry), In p (nwPackets net) /\ mEntries (pBody p) = Some entries /\ In e entries)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> input -> network -> Prop Arguments applied_implies_input_state {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
entries_match_append : forall (xs ys es : list entry) (ple : entry) (pli : nat) (plt : term), sorted xs -> sorted ys -> sorted es -> entries_match xs ys -> (forall e1 e2 : entry, eIndex e1 = eIndex e2 -> eTerm e1 = eTerm e2 -> In e1 es -> In e2 ys -> (forall e3 : entry, eIndex e3 <= eIndex e1 -> In e3 es -> In e3 ys) /\ (pli <> 0 -> exists e4 : entry, eIndex e4 = pli /\ eTerm e4 = plt /\ In e4 ys)) -> (forall i : nat, pli < i <= maxIndex es -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e es) ->...-> entries_match (es ++ removeAfterIndex xs pli) ys
handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets net) -> sorted (log st')
state_machine_safety_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> t >= currentTerm (nwState net h) -> commit_recorded net h e ->...-> Prop Arguments state_machine_safety_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
packets_gt_prevIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt entries c -> In e entries -> eIndex e > pli : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments packets_gt_prevIndex {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
log_matching_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit ->...-> Prop Arguments log_matching_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t es res = (d, m) -> pBody p = AppendEntriesReply t es res -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
packets_ge_prevTerm = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt entries c -> In e entries -> eTerm e >= plt : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments packets_ge_prevTerm {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Build_sorted_interface : (forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets net) -> sorted (log st')) ->...-> sorted_interface
findAtIndex_intro : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), sorted l -> In e l -> eIndex e = i -> uniqueIndices l -> findAtIndex l i = Some e
findAtIndex_max_thing : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry) (i : nat), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In e (log (nwState net h)) -> eIndex e > i -> 1 <= i -> exists e' : entry, findAtIndex (log (nwState net h)) i = Some e'
raft_net_invariant_append_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_append_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
findAtIndex_elim : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), findAtIndex l i = Some e -> i = eIndex e /\ In e l
RIR_handleMessage : forall (p : packet) (net : network) (xs ys : list packet) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (d, l) -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> (forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d h) -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (xs ++ ys) \/ In p' (send_packets (pDst p) l)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
raft_intermediate_reachable_ind : forall P : network -> Prop, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
raft_intermediate_reachable_sind : forall P : network -> SProp, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
raft_invariant_handle_message : forall (P : network -> Prop) (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> P {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
doGenericServer_applied_entries : forall (ps : list packet) (h : name) (sigma : Net.name -> data) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps; nwState := sigma |} -> doGenericServer h (sigma h) = (os, st', ms) -> exists es : list entry, applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') = applied_entries sigma ++ es /\ (forall e : entry, In e es -> exists h0 : Net.name, In e (log (sigma h0)) /\ eIndex e <= commitIndex (sigma h0))
commitIndex_lastApplied_match = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h h' : Net.name) (e : entry), commitIndex (nwState net h') <= lastApplied (nwState net h) -> eIndex e <= commitIndex (nwState net h') -> In e (log (nwState net h')) < -> In e (log (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments commitIndex_lastApplied_match {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
lastApplied_lastApplied_match = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h h' : Net.name) (e : entry), lastApplied (nwState net h') <= lastApplied (nwState net h) -> eIndex e <= lastApplied (nwState net h') -> In e (log (nwState net h')) < -> In e (log (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments lastApplied_lastApplied_match {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t v = d -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
maxIndex_is_max : forall (l : list entry) (e : entry), sorted l -> In e l -> maxIndex l >= eIndex e
commit_recorded = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry) => In e (log (nwState net h)) /\ (eIndex e <= lastApplied (nwState net h) \/ eIndex e <= commitIndex (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Net.name -> entry -> Prop Arguments commit_recorded {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
sorted = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix sorted (log : list entry) : Prop := match log with | [] => True | e :: es => (forall e' : entry, In e' es -> eIndex e > eIndex e' /\ eTerm e >= eTerm e') /\ sorted es end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> Prop Arguments sorted {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope

intros net p es e H1 H2 H3 H4. specialize (H3 _ H2) as H5. apply H5 in H3 as H6. destruct e as [at client id index term input].
